= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *pulmonary-neuroepithelial-bodies*: trachea, bronchial tree and lungs - intraepithelial receptors
  * *Lung - glands of trachea, lungs, and bronchi* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PUG AVA.PN.PSYM.PUG] -> visceral-glands): increase in airway secretions
  * *Lung - smooth muscles of trachea and bronchial tree* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PUG AVA.PN.PSYM.PUG] -> smooth-muscles): constriction of trachea and bronchioles
  * *Lung - thoracic diaphragm* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PHR BMA.SC.VH.PHR] -> thoracic-diaphragm): increases thoracic cavity volume; inhalation
  * *Lung - pericardium and pleura receptors* (pericardium-pleura-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG]): somatic sensations
  * *Lung - pharyngeal tonsils* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PTG AVA.PN.PSYM.PTG] -> pharyngeal-tonsils): defense mechanism against air infections, produce white blood cells which are essential for immunity
  * *Lung - pulmonary stretch receptors* (pulmonary-stretch-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_JUG AVA.PN.SG.JUG]): imitate the Hering-Breuer reflex, which reduces the respiratory rate; increased firing from the stretch receptors also increases production of pulmonary surfactant
  * *Lung - stylopharyngeus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> stylopharyngeus-muscle): elevate the larynx, elevate the pharynx, swallowing
